section.heading: “Recall” defined.
section.text: The term “recall” means the process by which the qualified electors of the District of Columbia may call for the holding of an election to remove or retain an elected official of the District of Columbia (except the Delegate to Congress for the District of Columbia) prior to the expiration of his or her term.

annotations.annotation: Elections, recall of elected officials, see § 1-1001.17.
